title: MyPet宠物插件的玩家数据是哪个文件？
author: AAAX112234
txt_content:
原贴https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-889330-1-1.html
仅仅删除玩家宠物数据！

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
应该是 plugins\MyPet\pets.db

建议备份后再删

replies.author: AAAX112234
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-8-13 22:45
应该是 plugins\MyPet\pets.db

建议备份后再删
不行删除了 那些设置的就没了

replies.txt_content:
